title: I swear someone is paying solo q players to make me lose.

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: I don't know whats happening, either I get the worst teammates ever, or i'm just tilted af.

replies.body:
Most people will tell you it's just your fault, this is true to some extent if you just loose all the time, but short tiled days can be due to the elo system.

Your winrate in ranked is currently 56%. The elo system is trying to bring that down to 50% so they match you with better players. Riot is literally stacking the deck against you. Win streaks also enhance this.

The same applies for loss streaks though, so you should start winning some games after this loss streak is done.

So yeah, someone is trying to make you loose solo queue. It's Riot XD
(You realize that a guy got to challenger with a 80% win rate yeah?)

People like faker are an exception to the rule. In statistics, one person out of a thousand is considered an outlier, and therefore irrelevant to any actual conclusions that can be drawn from said statistics.

The rule as it is, is Riot balances the game around players having a 50% win rate. at 50% win rate, you will still climb, but slowly. If you do much better in your games, win a lot in a row and get, say, 60% win rate, your MMR will start to spike, matching you with better players. If you beat them, your MMR climbs even higher. However, that doesn't disprove when he said. Riot will actively (through the MMR system) try to keep your win rate at 50%. If you get higher than that, you are OBVIOUSLY better than whatever MMR/Division you are in, and evntually you will either climb to the division you should be at, or you will lose to better players, get a loss streak and drop MMR and winrate.
Just wanted to clarify that this is a smurf account, I know how mmr works lol. Anyways just wanted some cheeky banter on the boards considering I did well in nearly all of the games :)

I think that's what happened to me just today. This wasn't only Ranked, but I had won 6 games in a row playing only jungle like 2 or 3 days ago. Then yesterday and today I lose all my games, ending up on 8-loss streak, ranked and normals alike.

 It was literal cancer, some of the players I was matched with. I got ganked by nidalee as a Vladimir top against a volibear. I nearly escaped them, but voli flash-q'd me and I died. Then what does rengar do? Tries to kill the nidalee 1v1, get's her low, but voli comes, so he flashs to kill the nidalee, and dies to the voli too. Doesn't speak for the entire game after saying "Damn, sorry"
Hardlife
